title: 康軒國中英語 B3L7 Reading 動畫

json.text: We had a fun lesson about London yesterday.
Our teacher didn't make us learn the names of places in London from a book.
Instead, he took us to the computer classroom and let us take an interesting online trip to London.
We used Google Maps for our trip.
Our teacher had us find the Thames River because there are a lot of famous places along it.
Then, we started with the London Eye.
We really wanted to ride on it and enjoy a bird’s-eye view of the city.
After that, we walked south and saw Big Ben on our right.
Then, we walked north along the river and went past the City Hall.
We saw the Tower Bridge and crossed it.
Soon, the Tower of London was on our left.
After this online trip, we have a clear picture of London.
And we can't wait to see these beautiful sights in person.
